snippet.title: Clock Tower: Rewind - Launch Trailer
snippet.description: The 16-bit nightmare is back! Experience a true pioneer in the survival-horror genre with Clock Tower: Rewind, available now on Switch, PlayStation 4 & 5, Xbox, and PC. Officially translated and released outside of Japan for the first time, this terrifying pixel-art adventure challenges you to hide, survive, and escape while being pursued by the maniacal Scissorman. Play the classic Original Mode or the enhanced Rewind Mode, and enjoy chilling extras like an animated intro, motion comics, art gallery, music player, creator interview, theme songs by Mary Elizabeth McGynn and Emi Evans, and more. https://wayforward.com/games/clock-tower
